类 BallDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • BallDemo

  • public class BallDemo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class BallDemo - provides two short demonstrations showing how to use the Canvas class.
    版本:
    2006.03.30
    作者:
    Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

      Create a BallDemo object.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void bounce()
      Simulate two bouncing balls
      void drawDemo()
      Demonstrate some of the drawing operations that are available on a Canvas object.
